intro.p: The GStreamer team is pleased to announce the first release of the unstable 1.11 release series. The 1.11 release series is adding new features on top of the 1.0, 1.2, 1.4, 1.6, 1.8 and 1.10 series and is part of the API and ABI-stable 1.x release series of the GStreamer multimedia framework. The unstable 1.11 release series will lead to the stable 1.12 release series in the next weeks. Any newly added API can still change until that point.
Full release notes will be provided at some point during the 1.11 release cycle, highlighting all the new features, bugfixes, performance optimizations and other important changes.
Binaries for Android, iOS, Mac OS X and Windows will be provided in the next days.

No perfectly groomed moustache or any amount of fine clothing is going to cover up the truth - these plugins are Bad with a capital B. They look fine on the outside, and might even appear to get the job done, but at the end of the day they're a black sheep. Without a golden-haired angel to watch over them, they'll probably land in an unmarked grave at the final showdown.

Don't bug us about their quality - exercise your Free Software rights, patch up the offender and send us the patch on the fastest steed you can steal from the Confederates. Because you see, in this world, there's two kinds of people, my friend: those with loaded guns and those who dig. You dig.

This module contains a set of plugins that aren't up to par compared to the rest. They might be close to being good quality, but they're missing something - be it a good code review, some documentation, a set of tests, a real live maintainer, or some actual wide use. If the blanks are filled in they might be upgraded to become part of either gst-plugins-good or gst-plugins-ugly, depending on the other factors. If the plugins break, you can't complain - instead, you can fix the problem and send us a patch, or bribe someone into fixing them for you. New contributors can start here for things to work on.

Other modules containing plugins are:
gst-plugins-base contains a basic set of well-supported plugins gst-plugins-good contains a set of well-supported plugins under our preferred license gst-plugins-ugly contains a set of well-supported plugins, but might pose problems for distributors gst-libav contains a set of codecs plugins based on libav (formerly gst-ffmpeg)

bug.summary: decklinkaudiosrc: does not allow the capture of more than 2 channels of embedded audio on SDI input
wayland: add DMABuf support to wayland sink
videoanalyse: doc not updated
Adds a new Image Quality Assessment plugin.
glimagesink: GstVideoOverlay crashes on widget resize (NSView / OS X)
mssdemux: improved live playback support
Add support for EBU-TT-D / TTML subtitles
dx9screencapsrc: add " cursor " option to draw the cursor
player: Cache duration and return cached duration
srtpdec: add stats readonly property
kmssink: support display mode setting
player: add set accurate seek config API
gstplayer: add media info get track num API
vdpsink: Fix memory leak due to usage of Xlib API
mpdparser: MS PlayReady object parsing support
qmlglsrc: Support change render target on the fly and move fps calculate into qtglwindow
mpdparser: MS PlayReady ContentProtection event is truncated
mpegts: fix typo in GstMpegtsDescriptor docs
adaptivedemux: improvements for live seeking/duration
smoothstreaming: support live seeking and reporting the live duration
mpdparser: Fix timestamp setting on fragment
opencv: move base opencv filter class and utilities to gst-libs
mpdparser: Support multiple Period elements in external xml
gdiscreencapsrc: remove unused local variable
mpdparser: Allows invalid URI within xlink attributes
curl: Sometimes upload hangs in case the connection was cut between the client and the HTTP server
meson: Build waylandsink
gl/egl: gstglcontext_egl.h removal fallout
Remove non-ported plugins
opencv: caps to IplImage format conversion fails for sparse formats
decklinkvideosrc: Issue " no signal " warnings
meson: wayland: mark wl_scanner as required: false
audiobuffersplit: New element that splits raw audio buffers into equal-sized buffers
decklinksrc: Stop using the " hardware " timestamps and directly use the pipeline clock
Regression: fatal error: gst/gl/egl/gstglcontext_egl.h: No such file or directory
glcontext/glwindow: Race when creating/quitting
rpi,gl: EGLImage creation errors
schro: #include math.h before schroedinger headers
codecparsers: h264parse: improve documentation
opencv: cvlaplace/cvsobel/edgedetect should use the already mapped outimage
opencv: facedetect/motioncells has spurious make_writable calls
aggregator: HTML Documentation does not display it as a class
interlace: Writing field-order into the src caps
Threads leaking after freeing up qmlglsink
waylandsink: lost display when playing a video playlist
Egl is being deinitialized on qmlglsink cleanup
ttmlparse: Transform caps event
opencv: add dewarp plugin
Fix caps memory leak from pad template creation
glimagesink: RGB png files don't work on raspberry pi (RGBA is fine)
gst-project-maker not included in distribution tarball
dashdemux: Drain remaining buffer in adapter
configure fails to detect QPA during cross compilation
dashdemux: Fix regression of On-Demand profile mpd playback
gl/egl: don't pass a GError to gst_gl_context_egl_choose_config when trying gles2
x265: fix two minor strings leaks
Fixed memory leak in usage of gst_pad_template_new() API
Fixed memory leak in gst module in usage of gst_pad_template_new() API
decklinkvideosrc: Do not append a zero timecode if none is found on the source
timecodestamper: Post element message with current timecode
qmlglsrc: use glBlitFramebuffer to copy texture for GLES3.0
jpegparse: Chain up to parent class' sink event handler
urisourcebin: Clear pad from pending list if it was linked
wayland plugin fails to build
New Plugin: Add GStreamer plugin for Intel's MediaSDK
msdk: add decoder
msdk: add mjpeg encoder/decoder
msdk: Add H.265 decoder
opencv: base opencv video filter class does not fully implement the video filter contract
opencv: reinstate check for opencv contrib, compilation fails without it
[PLUGIN-MOVE] Move dataurisrc to core
